column4: are there any audio cd rippers that support manually choosing a place to rip the cd to (not automagically) and allow choosing which CDDB entry to use?
most all are configurable for target dirs...or do you want one that prompts you each time you run it?
I like yaret quite a lot, it's perl and you can edit it as you please
asking me every time is whta I'm looking for (Although I think I just got sudiocd:/ to work, so thanks anyway)
